title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 2.25 - Personnel-cleanliness-item 18r
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 2.25 - Personnel-cleanliness-item 18r

State Regulations

All persons shall meet the following requirements: (a) Hands are washed clean and dried with an
individual sanitary towel immediately before milking, before performing any
milkhouse function, and immediately after the interruption of any of these
activities. (b) Milkers and milk
haulers wear clean outer garments while milking or handling milk, milk
containers, utensils or equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
2.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
